TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IBuildEngine4 implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine2, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.IBuildEngine3

summary.span: Esta interfaz extiende IBuildEngine para proporcionar un mecanismo que permite a las tareas compartir datos entre invocaciones de tareas.

span.span: This interface extends IBuildEngine to provide a mechanism allowing tasks to share data between task invocations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetRegisteredTaskObject(object key, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Framework.RegisteredTaskObjectLifetime lifetime) cil managed
Public Function GetRegisteredTaskObject (key As Object, lifetime As RegisteredTaskObjectLifetime) As Object

param.name: key
param.span: Clave que se usa para recuperar el objeto.

span.span: The key used to retrieve the object.

summary.span: Recupera un objeto de tarea previamente registrado almacenado con la clave especificada.

span.span: Retrieves a previously registered task object stored with the specified key.

returns.span: Devuelve un objeto registrado, o NULL si no hay ningún objeto registrado bajo esa clave o si el objeto se ha descartado a través de la colección inicial.

span.span: Returns a registered object, or null if there is no object registered under that key or if the object has been discarded through early collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RegisterTaskObject (object key, object obj, Microsoft.Build.Framework.RegisteredTaskObjectLifetime lifetime, bool allowEarlyCollection);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RegisterTaskObject(object key, object obj, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Framework.RegisteredTaskObjectLifetime lifetime, bool allowEarlyCollection) cil managed
Public Sub RegisterTaskObject (key As Object, obj As Object, lifetime As RegisteredTaskObjectLifetime, allowEarlyCollection As Boolean)
public: void RegisterTaskObject(System::Object ^ key, System::Object ^ obj, Microsoft::Build::Framework::RegisteredTaskObjectLifetime lifetime, bool allowEarlyCollection);

param.name: key
param.span: Clave que se usa para recuperar el objeto.

span.span: The key used to retrieve the object.

param.name: obj
param.span: El objeto que se va a conservar para su eliminación posterior.

span.span: The object to be held for later disposal.

param.name: allowEarlyCollection
param.span: Marcador que indica si el objeto puede ser desechado antes del tiempo solicitado.

span.span: Flag that determines whether the object can be disposed earlier than the requested time.

summary.span: Registra un objeto en el sistema que se desechará en algún momento especificado en el futuro.

span.span: Registers an object with the system that will be disposed of at some specified time in the future.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Este método puede llamarse las tareas que necesita para mantener el estado entre las invocaciones de tarea, por ejemplo, tareas de almacenamiento en caché de datos.This method may be called by tasks which need to maintain state across task invocations, such as data caching tasks. Se recomienda que `allowEarlyCollection` se establece en `true` si el objeto conservará cualquier cantidad significativa de datos.It is strongly recommended that `allowEarlyCollection` be set to `true` if the object will retain any significant amount of data. El subproceso en el que se elimina el objeto puede ser arbitrariamente, pero no se eliminará mientras la tarea se está ejecutando, incluso si `allowEarlyCollection` está establecido en `true`.The thread on which the object is disposed may be arbitrarily, but it will not be disposed while the task is executing, even if `allowEarlyCollection` is set to `true`. Si el objeto implementa IDisposable, IDisposable.Dispose se invocará en el objeto antes de descartarlo.If the object implements IDisposable, IDisposable.Dispose will be invoked on the object before discarding it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object UnregisterTaskObject(object key, valuetype Microsoft.Build.Framework.RegisteredTaskObjectLifetime lifetime) cil managed
Public Function UnregisterTaskObject (key As Object, lifetime As RegisteredTaskObjectLifetime) As Object

param.name: key
param.span: Clave que se usa para recuperar el objeto.

span.span: The key used to retrieve the object.

summary.span: Anula el registro de un objeto de tarea previamente registrado.

span.span: Unregisters a previously registered task object.

returns.span: Devuelve un objeto previamente registrado, o NULL si no hay ningún objeto registrado bajo esa clave o si el objeto se ha descartado a través de la colección inicial.

span.span: Returns a previously registered object, or null if there is no object registered under that key or if the object has been discarded through early collection.
